column4: What ubuntu version would you recommend running on a virtualization setup, 64 bit server, 8 gigs of ram (desktop, server, 32 or 64 bit)

i have about 2 weeks to test
use Hardy 8.04 32bit and virtualbox... how many servers?
currently using server 9.04 but seems to use a lot more memory than i expected. when I have 3 VM's running with 1.25gigs of memory each, the server uses 7 gigs of ram total
i'm also using vbox
How much swap do you have?
chose the defaults, top shows 5g
is any of it being used?
